name: Chip: The Last Forest Guardian (Aline Lott Lara)
name_original: Chip: The Last Forest Guardian (Aline Lott Lara)
description:
This is a game that is meant to bring awareness to habitat loss and the significant effect humans have on the environment. You play as a racoon in a robot suit equipped with a water gun to help solve puzzles and revitalize the raccoon's home. The puzzles themselves lead you to pieces of a seeding drone that will help replant trees and overall help bring life back to the forest.

If you need some help with the controls:

Escape/ESC: Open Pause Menu

WASD: Walking

TAB: Swap between Robot and Racoon

Shift: Dash

Spacebar: Jump

Shoot: Left Mouse Button

Zoom Shoot: Hold E Key and Shoot with Left Mouse Button

If you wish to leave the game press the key P and click the main menu button, and then click Quit.
